Headline: #49 Western, #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute at Western/26th
ShortDescription: 49 Western, X49 Western Express  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western 26th, California, Cermak and Western: due to street blockage near Western/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western, #X49 Western Express  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western 26th, California, Cermak and Western: due to street blockage near Western/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Leclaire
ShortDescription: WB 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near47th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near47th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to police activity.

Train service to Howard

After stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, Howard-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Armitage (accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Fullerton and make all normal stops to Howard.

Connections can be made between 95th/Dan Ryan-bound subway service and Howard-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at State/Lake (transfer to nearby elevated station, board on Brown Line side) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

95th/Dan Ryan-bound service is not affected.
